content: Use case: I want to precompile my .jl files. I managed to create a .ji file based on https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/issues/32926#issuecomment-522043620. While for reading a .ji file, I'm basing on https://groups.google.com/g/julia-users/c/pVrPLUAdT3U. But the answer in that thread for reading a .ji file (Base._include_from_serialized(open(readbytes, "myfile.ji"))) is outdated. What is the v1.x way of reading a .ji file?
